info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 21 at 5:36PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR ORANGE...EAST CENTRAL ADDISON...NORTHEASTERN RUTLAND...WINDSOR AND SOUTHWESTERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 536 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Allis State Park to South Randolph to West Bridgewater, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include... Rutland, Woodstock, Braintree Hill, Bradford, Killington, Thetford Hill State Park, Rutland City, Pomfret, Plymouth, Thetford, Hartland, West Rutland, Granville, Fairlee, Tunbridge, Sharon, Corinth Corners, Bridgewater, Pittsfield and West Windsor. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
